name: The Daily View -  Notion Template
description: The daily view Notion Template is designed to plan your whole day using the time-block technique. With this technique, you have better control or overview of how you want to spend your day. Additionally, this template has the following sectionsMy AffirmationsLife progress barTime blockToday’s quotesToday’s prioritiesToday I am grateful forEvening Check-in sectionTomorrow’s main focusDownload my weekly view template Download my monthly view template for free
features: My Affirmations; Life progress bar; Today’s quotes; Today’s priorities; Today I am grateful for; Evening Check-in section; Tomorrow’s main focus
